languages.text: "А я слышал{mf||а}, что Друз был не гвардейцем, а аристократом, и покушались на него конкуренты на место Голгенны. И из мертвых он не восставал — подосланный убийца просто не стал убивать его".

traits.locale_text: "А я слышал{mf||а}, что Друз был не гвардейцем, а аристократом, и покушались на него конкуренты на место Голгенны. И из мертвых он не восставал — подосланный убийца просто не стал убивать его".

languages.text: "I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it was contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."
languages.original_text: "А я слышал{mf||а}, что Друз был не гвардейцем, а аристократом, и покушались на него конкуренты на место Голгенны. И из мертвых он не восставал — подосланный убийца просто не стал убивать его".

traits.locale_text: "I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it were contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

"I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it were contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

"I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it was contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

"I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it was contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

"I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it was contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

languages.text: “我听说的版本是，德鲁苏斯并不是卫队成员，而是贵族。那些打算争抢戈尔根纳留下的空缺的人，打算雇人暗杀他。而且，他也并没有死而复生，只不过是那个刺客决定不杀他而已。”
languages.original_text: "I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it was contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

traits.locale_text: “我听说的版本是，德鲁苏斯并不是卫队成员，而是贵族。那些打算争抢戈尔根纳留下的空缺的人，打算雇人暗杀他。而且，他也并没有死而复生，只不过是那个刺客决定不杀他而已。”

languages.text: «A mis oídos llegaron relatos de que Drusus no era un guardia, sino un aristócrata, y que fueron los que se oponían a Golgenna los que trataron de arrebatarle la vida. Y no es que se levantara de entre los muertos, es que el asesino decidió no matarlo».
languages.original_text: "I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it was contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

traits.locale_text: «A mis oídos llegaron relatos de que Drusus no era un guardia, sino un aristócrata, y que fueron los que se oponían a Golgenna los que trataron de arrebatarle la vida. Y no es que se levantara de entre los muertos, es que el asesino decidió no matarlo».

languages.text: 「ドルススはガーズマンではなく貴族であり、ゴルゲンナの地位を狙う者たちがその命を狙ったという話を聞いたことがある。それに、彼は死から蘇ったのではなく、アサシンが彼を殺さなかっただけだと…」
languages.original_text: "I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it was contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

traits.locale_text: 「ドルススはガーズマンではなく貴族であり、ゴルゲンナの地位を狙う者たちがその命を狙ったという話を聞いたことがある。それに、彼は死から蘇ったのではなく、アサシンが彼を殺さなかっただけだと…」

languages.text: "Nach dem, was ich gehört habe, war Drusus kein Soldat, sondern ein Aristokrat, und der Anschlag auf Golgennas Leben wurde von Personen beauftragt, die seine Position wollten. Und er stand auch nicht von den Toten auf – der Assassine beschloss lediglich, ihn nicht zu töten."
languages.original_text: "I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it was contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

traits.locale_text: "Nach dem, was ich gehört habe, war Drusus kein Soldat, sondern ein Aristokrat, und der Anschlag auf Golgennas Leben wurde von Personen beauftragt, die seine Position wollten. Und er stand auch nicht von den Toten auf – der Assassine beschloss lediglich, ihn nicht zu töten."

languages.text: « J'ai entendu dire que Drusus n'était pas un garde impérial, mais un aristocrate, et que ses assassins présumés auraient été des concurrents visant le poste de Golgenna. Il n'aurait d'ailleurs même pas ressuscité, puisque le coupable a tout simplement décidé de ne pas le tuer. »
languages.original_text: "I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it was contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu dire que Drusus n'était pas un garde impérial, mais un aristocrate, et que ses assassins présumés auraient été des concurrents visant le poste de Golgenna. Il n'aurait d'ailleurs même pas ressuscité, puisque le coupable a tout simplement décidé de ne pas le tuer. »

languages.text: "Drusus'un Muhafız değil, aristokrat olduğuna ve canına kastedenlerin Golgenna'nın makamında gözü olanlar olduğuna dair çeşitli beyanlar duydum. Ölümden de dönmemiş, suikastçı onu öldürmemeye karar vermiş."
languages.original_text: "I've heard accounts that Drusus wasn't a Guardsman, but an aristocrat, and it was contenders for Golgenna's position who made an attempt on his life. And he didn't rise from the dead — the assassin just decided not to kill him."

traits.locale_text: "Drusus'un bir Muhafız değil de bir aristokrat olduğuna ve yaşamına kastedenlerin Golgenna'nın mevkisinde gözü olanlar olduğuna dair çeşitli beyanlar duydum. Ölümden de dönmemiş, suikastçı sadece onu öldürmemeye karar vermiş."
